Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MPC-A5K,A8K (Mastoparan C A5K,A8K, Synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich; Leu-rich; XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.86%) toMPK-A5KL: 36%; K: 36%.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 32 uM), B. cereus ATCC 11778 (MIC 16 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 4 uM), L. monocytogenes ATCC 15313 (MIC 4 uM), Gram- E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 8 uM), P. aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 64 uM), S. enterica ATCC 13076 (MIC 32 uM), and fungi C. albicans ATCC 10231 (MIC 16 uM).It also showed an effect on cancer cells A427 (IC50 5.1 uM), H1975 (IC50 6.25012.5 uM), and H441 (IC50 3.1-6.25 uM).Toxicity: human RBC, HC50 128 uM, less hemo.lytic.
Literature Information.Author: Thi Phuong HB, Huy BL, Van KN, Thi ND, Thi TB, Thi Hai YN, Thanh TB, Xuan HL, Thi Thanh BN. 2023
Literature Information.Reference: ACS Med Chem Lett. 2023 Dec 22;15(1):69-75. doi: 10.1021/acsmedchemlett.3c00385.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Reducing Self-Assembly by Increasing Net Charge: Effect on Biological Activity of Mastoparan C.
